We're excited to welcome Dr. Emily A. Beck to the Cresko Lab as a new postdoctoral researcher!

Emily brings exceptional expertise in evolutionary biology and population genomics to our team. Her arrival strengthens our research capacity and adds new perspectives to our ongoing projects in evolutionary genomics and adaptation.

## Research Background

Emily joins us with:

- PhD in evolutionary biology
- Population genomics expertise
- Bioinformatics skills
- Field work experience
- Strong publication record

## Research Interests

Emily will focus on:

- Population genomics
- Adaptive evolution
- Environmental genomics
- Method development
- Comparative approaches

## Initial Projects

Emily will contribute to:

- Stickleback genomics studies
- RAD-seq methodology
- Population structure analyses
- Environmental adaptation research
- Collaborative projects

## Technical Expertise

Emily brings skills in:

- Next-generation sequencing
- Computational biology
- Statistical genetics
- Data analysis pipelines
- Field sampling
